column4: I'm having problems installing torrentflux...  * Restarting web server apache2
apache2: Syntax error on line 233 of /etc/apache2/apache2.conf: Could not open configuration file /etc/apache2/conf.d/torrentflux.conf: No such file or directory
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
